default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: You've woken me from reverie. I should thank you, but... where else does a dancer without a stage belong?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: It is my destiny to comfort more souls with this power. I won't run away from it anymore.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: This is not yet the end. Until my life burns out, my dance will go on.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: The battered soul is singing, leading the way for us.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: The revelry is over. Rest in peace, I will take you home.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: The music ends, the dance stops, the crowd vanishes...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Let the dance begin!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Don't drop the curtain yet...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Whenever I'm lost in reverie, you'll show up and pull me back to reality... Hello, Chief. Welcome back.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: With the purest admiration for art in the audience, and the utter beauty in the world to interpret, I do not feel lonely.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Insatiable desire, a siege by Corruptors, and a dark prison cell, which one is real imprisonment?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: The body can speak for me, expressing gratitude, joy, struggle, and pain... Unfortunately, not everyone can understand it.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Ugly monsters? Please don't speak of them like that. Those beings known as Corruptors are my most loyal audience.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: The center of a Black Ring is like the depths of the sea. In a place so serene, you can listen to your heart clearly.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: A brutal beast will not know how to love, so... please never turn into one.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Certain emotions can only be expressed through dance. Come, give me your hand, follow my tempo... Can you... feel it, Chief?

default.title: Idle
default.text: Shh... Listen, that's the sound of your heart. Lub dub, lub dub... It's dancing too.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Are you... lonely? It's okay. I don't like to be touched by others, but you're the exception.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Such clear eyes... It must be wonderful to dance to the gaze from such a pair of eyes.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: The sound of the wind... is a dance gifted to us by nature.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I'm back. It was... a good experience.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: I feel... light as a feather?

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Hmm? Would you like to... dance with me?

default.title: Deploy
default.text: I can hear it... the prelude of the dance...

joyful_tune.title: Obtain Attire
joyful_tune.text: Swaying bells and heavy drumbeats... Come, let's dance. Let's dance on this snowy night!

joyful_tune.title: Greeting
joyful_tune.text: Every day without dance is a letdown to life. So... Come and dance with me, will you, Chief?

joyful_tune.title: Ordinary Contact 1
joyful_tune.text: The steps, the emotions, the body, the mind... Each element is essential. It's not merely a dance, but also a hymn to the soul.

joyful_tune.title: Ordinary Contact 2
joyful_tune.text: The strong emotions in this dance complement the atmosphere of the festival perfectly... Can everyone feel it?

joyful_tune.title: Ordinary Contact 3
joyful_tune.text: It's been a long time since I last saw such pure smiles after a performance. It truly feels wonderful...

joyful_tune.title: Ordinary Contact 4
joyful_tune.text: How I wish time could stop at this moment tonight forever... Hmm... I'm indeed very greedy.

joyful_tune.title: Idle
joyful_tune.text: I was touched by the power and generosity in this dance during the practices. May all your pain and unhappiness be gone after watching this dance.

joyful_tune.title: Special Attention
joyful_tune.text: Now that you're looking at me, please don't turn your gaze away. I will deliver all my emotions to you through my dance.

joyful_tune.title: Pat Head
joyful_tune.text: Hmm...? This is an updo I specifically did for this dance. Do you... like it?

odile.title: Obtain Attire
odile.text: Painful but elegant, each feather has its own story. This is a dance dedicated to you and you alone...

odile.title: Greeting
odile.text: Chief, this dance is very difficult. Those without proper training should not try the jumps and twirls.

odile.title: Ordinary Contact 1
odile.text: Black and white, light and darkness... are but two sides of the same coin. Just like Odette and Odile, whom I portray. In the prince's eyes, they've always been the same person.

odile.title: Ordinary Contact 2
odile.text: The scattered black feathers push the entire performance to its climax. Beauty and destruction are only a step away. This is the fate of beauty.

odile.title: Ordinary Contact 3
odile.text: Chief, who do you think I resemble more now? The innocent Swan Princess Odette, or the unbridled Black Swan Odile?

odile.title: Ordinary Contact 4
odile.text: Back then, people didn't want to see me portray Odile. They wanted to see absolute joy and beauty from me. I was more like the perfect white swan in their hearts, rather than a dancer...

odile.title: Idle
odile.text: Everyone knows that the soul and biggest challenge of this dance is Odile's thirty-two consecutive fouett√©s. Yet under your gaze, I completed it effortlessly...

odile.title: Special Attention
odile.text: How I wish we could be enveloped by music and dance, and savor this moment in bliss and freedom, forever.

odile.title: Pat Head
odile.text: You still want to try it...? Hmm, the final scene where I get lifted up... I think you can manage it.

odile.title: Level Up
odile.text: Let's spread our wings to our heart's content.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Obtain Attire
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Have you crossed rivers and seas? Traverse mountains and plains all to find me? That explains perfectly why my heart ripples like the waves upon seeing you again.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Level Start
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: March forward warrior.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Win Battles
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Dance with me in triumph and celebrate this victory.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Lose Battles
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: The Earth is parched and fractured. Let us seek refuge in the embrace of the forest for now.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Ultimate Skill
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Flow, shall the springs. Here thy confluence.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Die in Battles
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: It has all vanished into vapors.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Greeting
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: When we first met in your dream, your eyes were clear and bright. You smiled and held out your arms to me. That unfafilled embrace shall we finish it now?

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Ordinary Contact 1
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: If you stay with me, I would dance for you at every moonrise and moonfall.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Ordinary Contact 2
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: When the forest falls into tranquility at night, the lake becomes my stage. Elves flap their wings, and the moon reflects into the most beautiful spotlight. Look, are you as intoxicated as I am?

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Ordinary Contact 3
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: I've heard that at earthly balls, partners will hold each other's hands all the way through the dance. Feeling the warmth of your palm, I finally see why they wouldn't want to let go.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Ordinary Contact 4
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Dreams and reality, goddesses and mortals, there is an impossible gap between them. But I think, with a heart of love, nothing is insurmountable.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Interaction 1
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: No one has ever set foot in this clear spring. Only you got an invitation from the elves. They really adore you. Yes. I'm really glad you came here. Came to me.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Interaction 2
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Hmm. I look a bit weird? Hmm. Sorry. I guess I'm just too happy with you around.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Interaction 3
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Is it not cozy enough for you? Relax. And drift into sweet dreams.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Interaction 4
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: You're smiling. How wonderful. I hope you find peace of mind here.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Interaction 5
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: The elves are glad you came. They keep babbling about a story of the destined one. Would you like to know?

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Exit Interaction
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Are you well rested? Then, I'll see you next time.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Idle
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: There there. I will follow the steps of the wind and stay by your side. Watching over you.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Annoyed
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: You journeyed to me through great trials. How could I ever turn away from you?

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Special Attention
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Many have admired my lake and my dance, and I gladly perform for them. Yet, only your gaze can stir the waters and make my dance truly come alive.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Level Up
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Your presence will make the power of the clear spring even stronger.

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Pat Head
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: Hairband made of moonlight or pin formed by water drops. Which one do you prefer me to wear?

azure_waltz_in_solace.title: Deploy
azure_waltz_in_solace.text: A trickle of water will shield you from harm on you courageous journey.
